Package main

Class Item

java.lang.Object
main.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
public class Item extends Object implements Purchasable
Represents an item that can be purchased. Implements the Purchasable interface.

    • Item

      public Item(String itemName, int[] stats)
      Constructs a new Item object with the specified name and statistics.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item
      stats - an array of statistics including defense boost, offense boost, stamina boost, contract cost, and sell back price

  • Method Details

      public int getOffenceBoost()

      the offensive boost of the item (measured on a scale of 0 to 100)
